title: answering calls by voice command
content: I'm partially disabled and depended on Samsung's "accept or reject" commonands to anwer my phone. The tech rep at verizon led me to belive this was possible with a Pixel since assistant was always on. Unfortunately this is not the case. Why is this not possible. It is an almost essential feature for me. Any relief in sight?
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 2
